flores_passage: Vanhu vanga vachibatanidzwa kwemakumi emakore akatibatsira kuti tikoshese masimba edu nezvido zvedu tichinyatsoongorora matambudziko uye kutadza. Tichiteerera kune vanhu vachigoverana nyaya dzavo pachavo, dzemhuri, uye dzesangano, takawana nzwisiso inokosha munguva yakapfuura uye vamwe vevanhu vakapesvedzera zvakanaka kana zvakaipa tsika dzesangano. Nepo kunzwisisa nhoroondo yemunhu kusingafungire kunzwisisa tsika, zvinobatsira vanhu kuwana pfungwa yekuti vanowira papi munhoroondo yesangano. Ndichiri kuongorora kubudirira uye kuziva nezvekukundikana, vanhu uye vanhu vese vari kutora chikamu vanowana zvakadzama kukosha, mishoni, uye kutyaira kwesangano. Muchiitiko ichi, kurangarira zviitiko zvakapfuura zvemaitiro ebhizinesi uye kubudirira kunoguma kwakabatsira vanhu kuvhurika kune shanduko itsva uye gwara idzva rechechi yeko. Nyaya dzebudiriro dzakadai dzakaderedza kutya kweshanduko, uku dzichigadzira mafungiro akanaka ekuchinja mune ramangwana.

Zvamazvirokwazvo, hapana chinhu chimwe chakanaka chokudzidza.Kudzidza kunoitika muchiitiko pakati pemudzidzi neruzivo rwunopihwa. Chiitiko chedu chemazuva ano nezvese-iwe-iwe pachako uye ruzivo rwekupa ruzivo, ruzivo-rwakavakirwa paterevhizheni rinoratidza pfungwa iyi. Saka vazhinji vedu tinozviwana tichiona terevhizheni inotizivisa nezvemaitiro kana chiitiko chatisingazombotore chikamu kana kushandisa ruzivo irworwo. flores_passage: Dzidziso dzemukati dzakanangana nekutsvaga izvo zvinoita kuti vanhu vakwekwe kana kukwezva kwavari. flores_passage: Kwenguva yakareba muzana remakore rechigumi nemapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri, zvakatendwa kuti vagari vekutanga veNew Zealand vaiva vanhu veMaori, vaivhima shiri huru dzinonzi moas. Dzidziso yacho yakabva yatanga pfungwa yokuti vanhu veMaori vakatama kubva kuPolynesia muGreat Fleet ndokutora New Zealand kubva kuMoriori, vachigadzira sangano rekurima. Zvisinei, humbowo hutsva hunoratidza kuti vaMoriori rakanga riri boka revaMaori vepanyika vakatama vachibva kuNew Zealand vachienda kuChatham Islands, vachikudziridza tsika yavo yakasiyana, ine rugare. Paivewo nerimwe dzinza pazvitsuwa zveChatham ava vaive vaMaori vakatama vachibva kuNew Zealand. Vaizviti maMoriori paive netumwe kurwisana uye pakupedzisira, maMoriori akaparadzwa.

flores_passage: Mamiriro ehondo ehumambo hweRoma akabatsira mukusimudzira kufambira mberi mune zvekurapa. Vanachiremba vakatanga kutorwa naMambo Augustus uye vakatoumba boka rekutanga reRoman Medical Corps kuti rishandiswe mumashure ehondo. Vanachiremba vekuvhiya vaive neruzivo rwezvakasiyana-siyana zvekunyaradza zvinosanganisira morphine kubva muzvinyorwa zvepoppy mbeu uye scopolamine kubva kumbeu dzeherbane. Vakave nehunyanzvi hwekudimbura makumbo kuti vaponese varwere kubva kuronda reronda pamwe nekushanya uye matinji ekumisa kubuda kweropa. Kwemazana emakore akawanda, humambo hweRoma hwakaita kuti pave nebudiriro huru mune zvemishonga uye hwakaumba ruzivo rwakawanda rwatinoziva nhasi.

mc_answer2: Kushandisa zvinyorwa zvemhodzi dzeherbane zve scopolamine
mc_answer4: Kuita kudimbura nhengo dzevarwere vane gangrene

Ngarava dzepasi pemvura dzeGerman dzainzi U-Boats. MaGerman aive akanaka kwazvo pakufambisa nekushandisa ngarava dzavo dzepasi pemvura. flores_passage: MaSundarbans ndiro bhandi guru remangrove pasi rose, rinotambanuka 80 km (50 mi) kupinda muBangladeshi neIndia hinterland kubva kumahombekombe. Iyo Sundarbans yakaziviswa seUNESCO World Heritage Site. Chikamu chesango mukati menharaunda yeIndia chinonzi Sundarbans National Park. Masango haangori machakwi emanrove asi - anosanganisira mamwe ekupedzisira asara akamira emasango ane simba aimbove akafukidza bani reGangetic. MaSundarbans anovhara nzvimbo ye3,850 km², iyo inenge chikamu chimwe chete muzvitatu chakafukidzwa munzvimbo dzemvura / dzine tsvina. Kubva 1966 maSundarbans anga ari nzvimbo yemhuka dzesango, uye zvinofungidzirwa kuti ikozvino kune mazana mana eRoyal Bengal tiger uye vangangoita zviuru makumi matatu nemhembwe dzine mavara munzvimbo iyi.

Kunyanya mumazuva ako ekutanga, funga nezve splurging paWestern-style uye -mhando mahotera, chikafu, uye masevhisi kubatsira kujairana. flores_passage: Guva reTutankhamun (KV62). KV62 inogona kunge iri iyo inonyanya kuzivikanwa kumakuva emuMupata, chiitiko chekuwanikwa kwaHoward Carter muna 1922 kwekuvigwa kwehumambo kwakangoita kwamambo wechidiki. Kuenzaniswa neakawanda emamwe makuva ehumambo, zvisinei, guva reTutankhamun harifanirwe kushanyira, riri diki uye nekushongedza kushoma. Chero ani zvake anofarira kuona humbowo hwekukuvadza kwaamai kunoitwa panguva yekuedza kuibvisa kubva mubhokisi achaodzwa mwoyo sezvo musoro nemapfudzi chete zvinoonekwa. Hupfumi hunoshamisa hweguva hahuchisiri mariri, asi hwakabviswa kuenda ku Egypt Museum muCairo. Vashanyi vane nguva shoma zvingava zvakanakisisa kupedza nguva yavo kune imwe nzvimbo.

flores_passage: Bowen Island irwendo rwezuva rwakakurumbira kana rwendo rwekupera kwevhiki kupa kayaking, kukwira makomo, zvitoro, maresitorendi, nezvimwe. Iyi nharaunda yechokwadi iri muHowe Sound ichangobva kuVancouver, uye inowanikwa nyore nyore kuburikidza neakarongwa matekisi emvura anobva kuGranville Island mudhorobha reVancouver. Kune avo vanonakidzwa nemitambo yekunze, kukwira Gungwa kuenda kuSky corridor kwakakosha. Whistler (1.5 awa yekutyaira kubva kuVancouver) inodhura asi inozivikanwa kwazvo nekuda kwe2010 Winter Olympics. Munguva yechando, farira kumwe kutsetseka kwakanakisa muNorth America, uye muzhizha edza kumwe kukwira bhasikoro kwechokwadi.

flores_passage: Victoria Falls idhorobha riri kumadokero kweZimbabwe, mhiri kwemuganhu kubva kuLivingstone, Zambia, uye pedyo neBotswana. Mumwaka wekunaya kwemvura (Mbudzi kusvika Kurume), huwandu hwemvura huchakwira uye Mapopoma achange achishamisa. Unovimbiswa kunyorova kana ukayambuka zambuko kana kufamba munzira dzinomonereka pedyo neMapopoma. Ukuwo, imhaka yokuti uwandu hwemvura hwakakwirira kwazvo zvokuti kuona kwako Mapopoma chaiwoiwo kuchavharwa—nemvura yose!

flores_passage: Victoria Falls idhorobha riri kumadokero kweZimbabwe, mhiri kwemuganhu kubva kuLivingstone, Zambia, uye pedyo neBotswana. Dhorobha riri pedyo nekupopoma, uye ndidzo dzinokwezva zvikuru, asi nzvimbo iyi inozivikanwa yevashanyi inopa vese vanotsvaga mafambiro nevanoona mikana yakawanda yekugara kwenguva refu. Mumwaka wekunaya kwemvura (Mbudzi kusvika Kurume), huwandu hwemvura huchakwira uye Mapopoma achange achishamisa. Unovimbiswa kunyorova kana ukayambuka zambuko kana kufamba munzira dzinomonereka pedyo neMapopoma. Ukuwo, imhaka yokuti uwandu hwemvura hwakakwirira kwazvo zvokuti kuona kwako Mapopoma chaiwoiwo kuchavharwa—nemvura yose!

Rufu rwakawanda rwunoitika nekuda kwekuneta kuyedza kushambira uchidzokera kumashure, izvo zvingave zvisingaite. Paunongobuda kubva ikozvino, kushambira kumashure hakuna kuoma kupfuura zvakajairika. flores_passage: World's Fair (inowanzonzi World Exposition, kana kungoti Expo) mutambo mukuru wepasi rose wehunyanzvi nesainzi. International Horticultural Expositions zviitiko zvine hunyanzvi zvinotaridza kuratidzwa kwemaruva, magadheni ebhodhoro uye chero chinhu chine chekuita nezvirimwa. Kunyange zvazvo muchirevo vanogona kuitika gore negore (chero bedzi vari munyika dzakasiyana), mukuita havasi.
